name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Next Caller
description: This is a repository of next caller APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Next Caller
apis.description: Identify inbound phone numbers and increase sales conversion with accurate real-time caller data. Accurately detect phone spoofing fraud before you pickup the phone and route your inbound calls intelligently
